'Glycolic acid' (or 'hydroxyacetic acid') is the smallest Î±-hydroxy acid (AHA).
This colorless, odorless, and hygroscopic crystalline solid is highly soluble in
water. It is used in various skin-care products. Glycolic acid is found in some
sugar-crops.
